mapper.select: SELECT idx , user_name , regdate , img_path , IFNULL (( select 1 from instagram.story_log sl where view_user_idx = 99 and story_idx = A.idx ), 0) as view_yn FROM instagram.user_info A
SELECT idx , content , regdate , img_path , user_idx FROM instagram.story WHERE user_idx = #{user_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO instagram.story_log ( story_user_idx , view_user_idx , regdate , story_idx ) VALUES( #{user_idx} , 99 , now() , ( select MIN(idx) from instagram.story s where user_idx = #{user_idx} and idx not in (select story_idx from instagram.story_log sl where view_user_idx = 99 and user_idx = #{user_idx}) group by user_idx ) )
INSERT INTO instagram.feed_list ( user_idx , feed_contents , regdate , use_yn ) VALUES ( #{user_idx} , #{feed_contents} , NOW() , 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(feed_idx) FROM instagram.feed_list WHERE user_idx = #{user_idx}
SELECT MAX(story_idx) FROM instagram.story_list WHERE user_idx = #{user_idx}

SELECT FL.FEED_IDX , FL.FEED_CONTENTS , FL.REGDATE , JSON_ARRAYAGG(FP.FILE_NAME) AS FILE_NAMES , UI.USER_NICKNAME FROM FEED_LIST FL INNER JOIN FEED_PHOTO FP ON FL.FEED_IDX = FP.FEED_IDX INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON FL.USER_IDX = UI.USER_IDX GROUP BY FL.FEED_IDX ORDER BY FL.REGDATE DESC
